description: Contains processed and quality-controlled HydroVu sensor data ready for analysis and visualization. Data has undergone comprehensive multi-level QAQC processing and is integrated with field notes and historical records.
purpose: Provide analysis-ready water quality data with comprehensive quality flags and metadata

data_processing.source: Raw/HydroVu sensor measurements and field notes

subfolders.name: complete_archive
subfolders.description: Maintains historical versions of complete QAQC datasets

subfolders.name: visualization_archive
subfolders.description: Stores time-limited datasets optimized for dashboards and visualization

complete_dataset.description: Full historical water quality record with QAQC flags
complete_dataset.content: all processed data from network deployment to present

visualization_dataset.description: Recent 45 days of data optimized for dashboard display
visualization_dataset.content: rolling 45-day window of most recent data

primary_columns: mal_flag - manual malfunction flags from field notes
quality_indicators: n_obs - number of observations in aggregation

flag_categories: Field Activity Flags - site visits and maintenance
Depth and Submersion Flags - sonde position issues
Maintenance and Malfunction Flags - equipment issues

file_formats: parquet - primary storage format for efficient analysis
csv - alternative format for broader compatibility

access_patterns.read_frequency: continuous by analysis and visualization systems

data_retention.main_folder: current version only - older versions moved to archive
data_retention.archive_policy: maintain 3 most recent versions of each dataset type

performance_optimization.partitioning: data organized by site and parameter for efficient querying
performance_optimization.compression: parquet format provides optimal compression and query speed
performance_optimization.indexing: temporal and spatial indexing for rapid data access

related_systems: Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 - storage platform
